articles.description: The poet and children’s author, who takes over from Cressida Cowell, was praised as an ‘extraordinary advocate for making poetry accessible to all’
articles.content:
Poet, playwright and author Joseph Coelho has been named the new Waterstones childrens laureate, and will look to celebrate the power of poetry during his two-year tenure.
Coelho takes over the role… [+4256 chars]

articles.title: Bill Bailey reflects on disastrous comedy gig in New Zealand that was intended to 'breach the racial divide' - The Independent
articles.description: ‘I did this song and the gig crashed and burned,’ he said
articles.content:
Bill Bailey has reflected on a disastrous comedy gig he did in New Zealand.
